name: Arcanist
description: Arcanists gain bonus Ability Power and scale AP with breakpoints.

name: Bilgewater
description: Damage generates Silver Serpents; spend them for Armory power-ups.

name: Bruiser
description: Bonus max HP for team; Bruisers gain more.

name: Defender
description: Grants Armor/MR to Defenders and nearby allies.

name: Demacia
description: Defensive rally mechanic as team loses HP.

name: Disruptor
description: Deals bonus damage to Dazzled enemies; reduces incoming damage.

name: Freljord
description: Summons frost towers that buff/damage.

name: Gunslinger
description: Fires additional bullets periodically.

name: Invoker
description: Increases team mana regen.

name: Ionia
description: Shields + unique stat bonuses per Ionian.

name: Ixtal
description: Completes Quests for Sunshards/loot.

name: Juggernaut
description: Extra tankiness; heals allies on death.

name: Longshot
description: Deals more damage with distance.

name: Noxus
description: Summons scaling Aberration.

name: Piltover
description: Activates inventions/modules.

name: Quickstriker
description: Gains Attack Speed scaling with enemy missing HP.

name: ShadowIsles
description: Gains Souls on takedown; empowers team.

name: Shurima
description: Ascends when losing HP; AS increase and healing.

name: Slayer
description: Omnivamp + bonus AD; bonus vs low-HP enemies.

name: Targon
description: Provides enhanced base stats and spell amplification.

name: Vanquisher
description: Ability crit scaling for crit chance & damage.

name: Darkin
description: Gains Omnivamp; unlocks unique tier bonuses.

name: Ascendant
description: Creates an Ascendant Charm in shop after combat.

name: Assimilator
description: Adapts spell based on greater damage type.

name: Blacksmith
description: Forges powerful Artifacts over time.

name: Caretaker
description: Generates free units/rerolls after combat.

name: Chainbreaker
description: Learns between multiple spell options.

name: Chronokeeper
description: Stores cast XP to accelerate player level.

name: DarkChild
description: Summons Tibbers who can be itemized.

name: Dragonborn
description: Transforms on cast and gains resistances.

name: Emperor
description: Summons constructs/sand soldiers.

name: Eternal
description: Wolf companion adds bonus attack effects.

name: Glutton
description: Consumes allies for permanent stats.

name: Harvester
description: Gains mana + reduces enemy armor/MR on kill.

name: Heroic
description: Starts combat from bench with special buffs.

name: HexMech
description: Pilot triggers effects upon death.

name: Huntress
description: Protective bond between Neeko and targeted ally.

name: Immortal
description: Revives under certain conditions and gains traits.

name: Riftscourge
description: Void rift deals plasma strikes and amplifies damage.

name: RuneMage
description: Spell modifies based on active region traits.

name: Soulbound
description: Lucian & Senna dual synergy with special effects.

name: StarForger
description: Accumulates Stardust to enhance spells.

name: TheBoss
description: Unique HP/AS self-strengthen mechanic.
